The app’s performance deteriorates significantly when the video is set to high resolution. Lowering the resolution helps, but it’s not ideal for high-quality meetings.
The app's text chat feature is limited. It lacks formatting options and doesn't support file attachments, which would be useful for sharing documents during calls.
There’s no way to see who has joined or left the call. Implementing a participant list that updates in real-time would be very helpful.
The app lacks support for different languages. Adding multi-language support would be beneficial for international users and improve accessibility.
The app’s visual effects, like filters and backgrounds, are often glitchy. They work intermittently and can disrupt the video quality.
I often experience audio feedback when multiple people are on the call. Adding a feature to automatically suppress audio feedback would improve the call quality.
The app’s user manual is outdated and doesn’t reflect the current version of the app. An updated and comprehensive manual would be very helpful for new users.
The app doesn’t provide a way to organize meetings into different folders or categories. Adding this feature would help keep things more organized.
The app’s transition animations are slow and can be distracting. Making these transitions smoother or providing an option to disable them would improve the user experience.
The app often fails to connect with external devices like webcams or microphones. Improving device compatibility would be essential for a smoother user experience.
I’d like to see better integration with productivity tools like task managers and note-taking apps. This would help in managing tasks discussed during calls more efficiently.
The app doesn’t support dual-monitor setups, which is limiting for users who want to multitask during calls. Adding support for dual monitors would be a great feature.
The app’s data usage is quite high, which is problematic for users with limited bandwidth. Providing an option to reduce data usage would be beneficial.
The app’s startup time is slow, which is inconvenient when you need to join a meeting quickly. Reducing the startup time would enhance the user experience.
There’s no option to customize the video layout during calls. Adding features to adjust the video feed layout would be a great improvement.
The app sometimes fails to update in real-time. Changes made during a call, like muting someone, might not reflect immediately to other participants.
The app has limited options for video effects and filters. More variety in effects could make the video calls more engaging and fun.
The app doesn’t provide detailed analytics on meeting performance or participant engagement. Adding analytics features could be useful for improving future meetings.
There’s no option to schedule recurring meetings. Implementing this feature would be helpful for regular team meetings or classes.
The app occasionally crashes when attempting to share screens with multiple participants. Stability improvements in screen sharing are needed.
The app doesn’t have built-in transcription for meetings. Adding transcription features could be useful for keeping records of discussions.
The app's notification system is too intrusive, with constant alerts even when the app is minimized. Providing customizable notification settings would improve user control.
The app doesn’t support integration with calendar applications. Adding this feature would help in managing and scheduling meetings more effectively.
The app often struggles with connectivity issues, especially in low-bandwidth environments. Enhancing connectivity features for better performance in such conditions is needed.
There’s no support for virtual backgrounds or blur effects for video calls. Adding these features would improve user privacy and experience.
The app’s text chat feature does not support emoji or GIFs. Adding these elements would make conversations more engaging and expressive.
The app doesn’t offer an option to set custom ringtones for incoming calls. Providing customizable ringtones could enhance user experience.
The app’s help section is difficult to navigate and doesn’t provide solutions to common issues. Improving the help section with better search functionality and detailed guides would be helpful.
There’s no way to customize the app’s interface or theme. Allowing users to adjust the appearance of the app could enhance personalization and comfort.
The app doesn’t offer integration with popular cloud storage services for sharing files. Adding this feature would be useful for collaborating on documents.
The app's user interface is cluttered and overwhelming, especially for new users. Simplifying the interface and providing a more intuitive design would enhance usability.
The app lacks an option to enable end-to-end encryption for calls. Adding this security feature would be crucial for users concerned about privacy.
The app does not have a feature to control or limit bandwidth usage, which can lead to poor call quality in low-bandwidth situations. Providing options to manage bandwidth would be helpful.
The app’s interface does not support high-DPI displays, resulting in blurry visuals on modern screens. Supporting high-DPI displays would enhance visual clarity.
The app doesn’t support background noise cancellation, which can be problematic in noisy environments. Adding noise cancellation features would improve audio clarity.
The app’s error messages are vague and unhelpful. Providing more detailed and actionable error messages would aid users in troubleshooting issues.
